channel.title: The Song of Urania
channel.itunes:summary: A history of astronomy, from antiquity to the present.
channel.itunes:author: Joe Antognini
channel.description: A history of astronomy, from antiquity to the present.

item.title: Episode 1: The Heavens & History
item.itunes:title: The Heavens & History
item.description: How should we approach the history of astronomy?  How have the questions that astronomers have asked changed through the ages?  We look at some of these questions and sketch out the broad arc of this field from antiquity to the present day.
item.content:encoded: How should we approach the history of astronomy?  How have the questions that astronomers have asked changed through the ages?  We look at some of these questions and sketch out the broad arc of this field from antiquity to the present day.
